contents:
通过data给组件传入数据，v-model进行数据双向绑定，绑定的结果是选中的每一项组成的数组。其中data的数据格式如示例所示：

  1. value选中后的值
  2. label展示的文案
  3. children如果存在子选项，需要递归地指定该属性
  4. disabled禁用该项

highlighted.content:
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

<div>
    <Cascader data={{ self.get('data') }} v-model="value" />
    You selected: {{ JSON.stringify(self.get('value')) }}
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            data: [
                {
                    value: 'beijing',
                    label: '北京',
                    children: [
                        {
                            value: 'haidian',
                            label: '海淀区'
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'chaoyang',
                            label: '朝阳区'
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'fengtai',
                            label: '丰台区'
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    value: 'hunan',
                    label: '湖南',
                    children: [
                        {
                            value: 'changsha',
                            label: '长沙市',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    value: 'yuelu',
                                    label: '岳麓区',
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            value: 'yueyang',
                            label: '岳阳市',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    value: 'yueyanglou',
                                    label: '岳阳楼区',
                                },
                                {
                                    value: 'yueyangxian',
                                    label: '岳阳县',
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
    }
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Cascader :data="data" v-model="value" />
        You selected: {{ stringify(value) }}
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Cascader from 'kpc/components/cascader';

export default {
    components: {
        Cascader
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "data": [
                {
                    "value": "beijing",
                    "label": "北京",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "haidian",
                            "label": "海淀区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "chaoyang",
                            "label": "朝阳区"
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "fengtai",
                            "label": "丰台区"
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "value": "hunan",
                    "label": "湖南",
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "value": "changsha",
                            "label": "长沙市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yuelu",
                                    "label": "岳麓区"
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            "value": "yueyang",
                            "label": "岳阳市",
                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyanglou",
                                    "label": "岳阳楼区"
                                },
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyangxian",
                                    "label": "岳阳县"
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ],
            "value": null
        }
    },
    methods: {
        stringify(data) { return JSON.stringify(data); },
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
// 敬请期待...
